description: This table contains information about happy hours at shops, including the shop's identifier, the month of the happy hour, and the number of staff in charge.

HH_ID.description: Unique identifier for the happy hour event

Shop_ID.description: Identifier of the shop hosting the happy hour

Month.description: Month in which the happy hour takes place

Num_of_staff_in_charge.description: Number of staff members in charge during the happy hour
